name: In re M.J.M., a Minor. Appeal of M.J.M., a Minor

judges: Before: CAPPY, C.J., CASTILLE, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.

parties: In re M.J.M., a Minor. Appeal of M.J.M., a Minor.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Justice NIGRO did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Jeanne Trivellini, Andrea E. Mertz, Glenn D. Welsh, Reading, for M.J.M., a minor, appellant.
Mark Carlyle Baldwin, Reading, Douglas Jerome Waltman, Alisa R. Hobart, for the Com. of PA, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
886 A.2d 1136
In re M.J.M., a Minor. Appeal of M.J.M., a Minor.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 7, 2005.
Decided Dec. 21, 2005.
Jeanne Trivellini, Andrea E. Mertz, Glenn D. Welsh, Reading, for M.J.M., a minor, appellant.
Mark Carlyle Baldwin, Reading, Douglas Jerome Waltman, Alisa R. Hobart, for the Com. of PA, appellee.
Before: CAPPY, C.J., CASTILLE, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.
